property.name: allowAddNew
property.description-key: (boolean) when True, adds an Add New button to the combobox dropdown

property.name: label
property.description-key: (optional) display label for the lookup control (use this when the control is more than 33% of form width to avoid a visible horizontal divider)

property.name: labelLocation
property.description-key: (optional) if using the in-control label, where to place the label

property.name: customFilter
property.description-key: (optional) when searching for related records, use this odata $Filter expression to limit the searchable records (e.g. `statecode eq 0 and new_mycolumn eq false`)

property.name: customOrder
property.description-key: (optional) when searching for related records, use this odata $Order expression to sort the records (e.g. `modifiedon desc`)

property.name: labelWidth
property.description-key: (optional, default: 140px) sets a max width to the label display. Label display widths are variable, depending on deployed release of platform and region, so use this parameter to tweak widths if it does not align with your existing columns.

property.name: searchMode
property.description-key: Designates the search mode of the control. When set to Simple, the control does all filtering in memory, but only operates on the top 5k rows of the searched table. When set to Advanced, the control uses Dataverse Search to query for results as the user types.

property.name: matchWords
property.description-key: (optional, only applies when Advanced Search Mode is enabled) Designates the search term matching for multi-word search strings. All requires that results match ALL terms in the search string, any, allows results that match ANY of the terms

property.name: bestEffort
property.description-key: (optional, only applies when Advanced Search Mode is enabled) When True, allows Dataverse to return probable results when no good results are found otherwise
